title: Consent
description: Schema for a Universal Hiring Protocol (UHP) Consent object.

consentId.description: Unique identifier for the consent record.

subject.description: Identifier of the entity whose consent is being managed (e.g., candidateId).

grantedTo.description: Identifier of the entity to whom consent is granted (e.g., EmployerAgentId).

scope.description: Defines the specific data elements or actions for which consent is given.

purpose.description: The specific purpose for which the data can be used.
